Debian Linux


Pros

  • Processor architecture support (amd64, i386, arm64, armhf, armelâ€¦)1).
  • Userbase + amount of packages in repositories2).
  • Independent distribution.
  • Stability.
  • Binary based.

Cons

  • SystemD.
  • Point release + package manager.
  • Graphical installation.
  • Messy official website.
1)
Debian supported processor architectures: https://wiki.debian.org/SupportedArchitectures.
2)
Package management across different linux distributions: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Linux_distributions#Package_management_and_installation.
